entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Parrsboro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parrsboro 12:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: N 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
